nodes.text: A clan of Mandalorian mercenaries were active during the Dark Wars on Dantooine, seeking to do work. However, when traveling with the Jedi Exile, Mandalore the Preserver attempted to recruit the clan to his quest in reuniting the clans. Esok, the leader of the clan, refused to follow him and attempted to take Mandalore's Mask to become the new Mand'alor. Esok was then killed and the other members of clan joined Mandalore the Preserver on Dxun.
